ComicInfo.Title: Cracked Interviews the Nuclear Power King; The Dorks of Hazzardous; A Cracked Salute to New York City; Cracked's Random Samplings; The Cracked World of Schooling; Using Star Trek Logic and Technology to Solve Life's Everday Problems; What Is a Fad Freak?; Situations You Wish You Weren't In; Cracked's Reasons to Be Cheerful; The Not-So-Bright Shadow
ComicInfo.Summary: British editions are identical to the US editions except for the price and cover date. The UK numbering includes Cracked Collectors' Editions.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev36 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-04-05 17:40:25. [Issue ID 250531]

ComicInfo.Inker: Don Orehek,Bill Ward,John Severin,Su Gumen,Howard Nostrand,Catherine Severin,Sam Whitehead,Warren Sattler
